message: Second Brain build FAILED
Vault search overhaul - search page, API, smart command bar
Chat page now routes through OpenClaw gateway - talking to real Paul
Mobile PWA polish + settings page overhaul
Tool audit complete + memory system v2 improvements
Fixed /agents to use vault data instead of requiring gateway tunnel
Fixed /commands to use Gemini locally instead of gateway tunnel
Verified and fixed live data pipeline scripts
Wired /memory page to live BigQuery data lake via /api/datalake route — no more proxy server needed
Test activity post
All 9 GitHub repos wired into knowledge graph with live stats
3 TatT builder agents running — fixing imports, error boundaries, /pitch page
Auto-commit now triggers Vercel revalidation when vault changes
ISR revalidation API deployed — /api/revalidate endpoint for live cache busting
Auto-logging pipeline live — post-activity.sh, update-tasks.sh, deploy-brain.sh
Knowledge graph upgraded — 67 nodes with TatT, Nexus, IRL, data sources
Testing deploy-brain.sh script
paul
Test activity from pipeline build
TatT market analysis — TAM/SAM/SOM, competitor landscape, unit economics, trend data with real sources.
YC application draft complete — all standard questions answered, full pipeline positioning, authentic voice.
Spawned 3 TatT builders: import fixer, error boundaries + demo mode, /pitch investor page. All on Sonnet 4.5.
Fresh Killua bootstrap doc written — current state, credentials, repos, deploy commands, NIGHTSHIFT queue.
Second Brain deployed to Vercel with all 5 wiring tasks + BigQuery deps + new env vars. brain.6eyes.dev live.
Cloudflare tunnel live — gateway reachable from Vercel at trycloudflare.com. Systemd service enabled for auto-restart.
Activity feed unified — pulls from BigQuery + vault with source filter pills (Email/Calendar/Drive/Agents).
Chat is context-aware — pulls live email/calendar/tasks state before each response. Paul personality baked in.
Commands execute locally via Gemini/BigQuery when gateway unreachable on Vercel. Dual-mode with inline results.
Dashboard now shows live BigQuery insights — event counts by source, AI analyses, connection status indicator.
Wired Ask Brain to BigQuery — searches email/calendar/decision history alongside vault docs before answering.
Rotated all API keys — scrubbed hardcoded secrets from 3 source files and 11 docs. New gateway + hook tokens deployed.

title: 🔧 Infrastructure Day
summary: Installed Homebrew, Gemini CLI, gog CLI, ClawHub. Authenticated Google ADC + Stitch API. Generated 9 Stitch UI screens (5 Second Brain, 2 Nexus, 2 TatT).

title: 🎨 Second Brain Stitch Redesign
summary: Rebuilt all 5 pages with Stitch-generated designs. Oregon Ducks theme, Space Grotesk font, gold accents. Live at brain.6eyes.dev

title: 🧠 Second Brain AI Agent
summary: Added /ask page powered by Gemini. Indexes all 53 vault docs. Ask your brain questions and get answers with source citations. Live at brain.6eyes.dev/ask

title: 🛡️ Heartbeat Spiral Fix
summary: Upgraded heartbeat model to Gemini 3 Pro. Simplified HEARTBEAT.md to prevent incoherent responses. Added safety valve for overwhelming context.

title: 🔗 Nexus: LinkedIn Content Tool — Spec & MVP
summary: Full product spec, competitive research, and MVP build for LinkedIn-focused AI content tool. Researched Taplio, AuthoredUp, Shield, Supergrow. Created SPEC.md (11 features, 5 personas, pricing tiers), COMPETITORS.md (gap analysis), ARCHITECTURE.md (tech stack, AI pipeline, database schema). Built Next.js 16 MVP with Oregon Ducks theme: landing page, dashboard, content composer, post history. All pages building successfully.

title: 🦆 Oregon Ducks × Nike Theme Redesign
summary: Complete redesign of Second Brain with Oregon Ducks/Nike theme. Forest green (#154733) + gold (#FEE123) color palette. Mobile-first responsive: hamburger menu, bottom nav, touch-friendly 44px tap targets. Updated 7 files: globals.css, layout.tsx, Sidebar.tsx, page.tsx, tasks/page.tsx, activity/page.tsx, deals/page.tsx, doc page. Build passes, deployed to Vercel.

title: YCombinator Prep Package
summary: Created comprehensive YC prep: application guide (S26 deadline Feb 9!), TatT vs IRL analysis (TatT wins 10-0), market sizing ($60B+ TAM), draft YC application, competitive moat analysis, and 1-minute demo video script. 6 documents, ~52KB total.

title: TatT Test Suite + TypeScript Migration
summary: Fixed TatT test suite — 129 tests now passing (was 0 runnable). Migrated 7 files to TypeScript: Button, Input, Card components + 4 services with proper types. Also added 18 tests to Second Brain. 6 commits pushed to main.

title: E-Rate Outreach: 3 Fortinet-Tagged Leads
summary: Researched and drafted personalized outreach emails for Ogallala NE (FortiGate 600F, Feb 24 deadline), Parkston SD (FortiGate 70G + Meraki displacement, Feb 26), and Deshler NE (43x FortiSwitch, Mar 3). Includes research dossier with contact details, LinkedIn profiles, and revenue estimates (~$120-170K total).

title: Book Chapter 4: Kids (and Other Tiny Terrorists)
summary: Drafted ~2,200 words covering the Pinterest parenting lie, the roommate phase, and the reality of raising tiny terrorists. Matches Samson's voice from the working copy.
